tool.name: OGS: MeshMapping
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'MeshMapping'.
tool.command: MeshMapping $lowpass #for $f in $static: --static '$f' #end for --distance '$distance' #for $f in $mesh: --mesh '$f' #end for #for $f in $raster: --raster '$f' #end for #for $f in $input: --input '$f' #end for --output output_1.vtu

param.name: lowpass
param.label: lowpass
param.help: Applies a lowpass filter to elevation over connected nodes.

param.name: static
param.label: static
param.help: Static elevation to map the input file to. This can be combined with

param.name: distance
param.label: distance
param.help: Maximum distance to search for mesh nodes if there is no

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: 2D mesh file to map the input file on,

param.name: raster
param.label: raster
param.help: Raster file to map the input file on,

tool.help: This tool runs the **MeshMapping** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
